Handles room to be created in the database

Specified by:
createRoom in interface LocalURLyBirdServices
Parameters:

Throws:
DuplicateKeyException - - if data argument unique key exists in the database

bookRoom

public void bookRoom(int recNo,
                     long ownerId)
              throws RecordNotFoundException,
                     java.lang.SecurityException,
                     InvalidFieldLengthException,
                     RoomAlreadyBookedException
Description copied from interface: LocalURLyBirdServices
Handles booking a room passing the unique record number to be booked

Specified by:
bookRoom in interface LocalURLyBirdServices
Parameters:
recNo - - an Integer value of the record number which the client connected to the server request to be booked
ownerId - - a long value of the client id who this room is gonna be booked to
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter
InvalidFieldLengthException - - If the argument String value length exceeds the required length
RoomAlreadyBookedException - - if the room was previously booked by this thread or another

searchRecords

public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,URLyBirdHotel> searchRecords(java.lang.String[] creteria)
                                                             throws RecordNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: LocalURLyBirdServices
Searched the record that matched the unique criteria passed into the function argument, URLyBirdHotel object of matched data are returned with there respective row number as there key in a Map data collection

Specified by:
searchRecords in interface LocalURLyBirdServices
Parameters:
creteria - - array of string with 2 sizes, first element matching the Hotel Name and second element matched the Location
Returns:
- Map object of matched URLyBirdHotel object value with there row number returned respectively as the map key
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
